com.gracenote.mmid.MobileSDK

Class GNRecognizeStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gracenote.mmid.MobileSDK.GNRecognizeStream

  • public class GNRecognizeStream
extends java.lang.Object
    This class processes an audio stream for recognition. The input stream is received via the writeBytes method. Results are returned via a GNResultReady object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GNRecognizeStream(GNConfig config)
      Initializes a new GNRecognizeStream object with the Application's GNConfig object and GNSearchResultReady

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelIdNow()
      Cancels an IdNow() call currently in progress.
      GNAudioConfig getGNAudioConfig() 
      void idNow()
      Performs audio stream recognition, storing results in the Result Ready object passed to the startSession call.
      void startSession(GNSearchResultReady resultReady, GNAudioConfig audioConfig)
      Starts the stream processing session by initializing objects needed to allow writeBytes to continuously feed audio samples to a buffer.
      void stopSession()
      Stops the stream processing session, releasing all resources allocated by startSession()
      void writeBytes(byte[] data)
      Writes PCM audio data to the GNRecognizeStream object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GNRecognizeStream

        public GNRecognizeStream(GNConfig config)
        Initializes a new GNRecognizeStream object with the Application's GNConfig object and GNSearchResultReady
        Parameters:
        config - Operation configuration

    • Method Detail

      • getGNAudioConfig

        public GNAudioConfig getGNAudioConfig()
        Returns:
        The audio configuration object passed to the startSession call

      • startSession

        public void startSession(GNSearchResultReady resultReady,
                GNAudioConfig audioConfig)
        Starts the stream processing session by initializing objects needed to allow writeBytes to continuously feed audio samples to a buffer. Note that no recognition is performed until idNow() is called.
        Parameters:
        audioConfig - audio configuration instance used to calculate internal streaming buffer size
        resultReady - Result Ready Object instance used to store recognition results

      • stopSession

        public void stopSession()
        Stops the stream processing session, releasing all resources allocated by startSession()

      • cancelIdNow

        public void cancelIdNow()
        Cancels an IdNow() call currently in progress.

      • writeBytes

        public void writeBytes(byte[] data)
        Writes PCM audio data to the GNRecognizeStream object. The PCM data should be of the same format specified in the GNAudioConfig object. Buffers of consistent length representing less than a second of PCM data are best.
        Parameters:
        data - buffer containing PCM data

      • idNow

        public void idNow()
        Performs audio stream recognition, storing results in the Result Ready object passed to the startSession call.
